refnamediv.refpurpose: Calls Kruskal Wallis test defined on R which takes 2 vectors and the length of the vectors as the argument. This function returns the kruskal test on the 2 vectors passed

listitem.para: Vectors on which the kruskal test is to be performed

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function accepts accepts two vectors and length of the vectors as arguments and returns the Kruskal Wallis test on these vectors as the output.The first value in the output to be intrepreted as test statistic H-result , the second to be degrees of freedom and the third to be the p-value.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: // Kruskal test on 2 vectors y = kruskal_wallis_vector(3,[1,2,3],[4,5,6])

simplelist.member: Mohana N (Assistant Professor, SAS, Divison of Mathematics, VIT Chennai)
